pages.text: This is the Refined Iron Ingot. Its properties are better then regular iron. Lets see how to make it! $(br2)First you have to sand an ingot down with some grit paper. $(br)Then combine it with some refining dust.
Now that you have the Refined Iron Dust, you have to make it into an unfired ingot.

pages.title: Unf Refined Iron Ingot
pages.text: After you have the unfired ingot you have to smelt that to get the Refined Iron Ingot! $(br2)Note: You can also smelt it in a blasting furnace!
